I have setup the canonicalization rules to clean up some dynamic URIs a sit=
e is producing. This rules i've created seem to work in the sense that dupl=
icate URIs are not downloaded. The problem I am having though is that in my=
 custom Archiver when i look at the URIs that are passed in they are not th=
e canonicalized version of the URIs. Is there a way configure Heritrix to n=
ot just use the canonicalized for when deciding whether or not to crawl a u=
ri, but actually use the canonicalized form when crawling?

I can't seem to=
 find another place besides the uriUniqFilter that does this kind of canoni=
calization.

I am using 2.0.2

Thanks,

steve
